example.text: Yesterday [[user]] passed the Protecting Taxpayers and Victims of Unemployment Fraud Act to address fraud & overpayments of pandemic unemployment insurance. Fraudsters stole billions of taxpayer dollars from expanded UI programs. Fixing this shouldn't be a partisan issue. [[url]]

Yesterday [[user]] passed the Protecting Taxpayers and Victims of Unemployment Fraud Act to address fraud & overpayments of pandemic unemployment insurance. Fraudsters stole billions of taxpayer dollars from expanded UI programs. Fixing this shouldn't be a partisan issue. [[url]]

Today I met with [[user]] members to discuss issues they are facing and my work in Congress. Labor shortages continue to be a top issue for our restaurants and [[user]] are encouraging more workforce participation through the Limit, Save, Grow Act! [[url]]
